title: Baptisma chang hi lo lawm la
lyrics:
Baptisma chang hi lo lawm la,
Aw Lalpa, kan Pathian;
An sual simin lo chang sela,
Nang leh mihring hmuhan.

Isuan, "Zuituah siam ulang,
Baptis zel r'u," a ti;
A zuitu hming pu tlak turin,
Thih thlengin pui ang che.

Tunah Kohhranhovah kan lawm,
Leiah hian hming ziakin;
Van Nunnabuah chhuang ve se,
Van Kohhranah lawmin.

Vantlang zinga chhinchhiah chan hi,
Isua tan inpein;
He chhinchhiah pu tlakah siam la,
Mualpho tawh lo turin.

Keinin tuiin kan baptis a,
Hei hi a tawk lo va;
Thlarau Thianghlim, mei baptisma,
Aw Isu, chantir la.
